## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G48040](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G48040)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ARAC8, ATRAC8, ATROP10, ROP10</u>
- **Gene Name:** Arabidopsis RAC-like 8, RHO-RELATED PROTEIN FROM PLANTS 10, RHO-related protein from plants 10
- **Description:**   RHO-related protein from plants 10;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2097905
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
